pageContext.title: Hearing Aid Re-Programming Service
pageContext.description: What is Hearing Aid Re-Programming Service?
pageContext.data:
Hearing Aid Re-Programming Service


We can usually adjust your "current" Hearing Aid to accomodate for additional Hearing Loss which will SAVE you money and keep you from having to purchase a brand new Hearing Aid. If you are no longer hearing well with your Hearing Aid and want to send it to us for repair or reprogramming, we will ask you to send a "current" Audiogram (Audiogram only good for 6 months) along with your Hearing Aid to our lab for hearing aid repair, so we can adjust your Hearing Aid accordingly.


NOTE: When you send us your Hearing Aid for a Hearing Loss Adjustment, you will receive a FREE Clean and Check on your Hearing Aid
